list_definition.definition: a small crease on the skin (usually on one’s face)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Her face is full of wrinkles.

list_definition.definition: to (cause to) become full of wrinkles or creases

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The damp had wrinkled the pages.
